text: The flag of San José de Gracia () It is colored green and white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF Green #009c3b ==References== San José de Gracia San José de Gracia Category:Flags with animals Category:Symbols of Aguascalientes
title: Flag of San José de Gracia
